caption.title:
genomic structure of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) and its encoded proteins. Together, open reading frames (ORFs) 1a and 1b are translated into all 16 non-structural proteins (Nsp1-16) while the remaining ORFs encode the structural (S, E, M, N) and accessory proteins (here represented as nine individual proteins). Adapted from Gordon et al.
54
